title: Self Mystery Gifting extension
body:
Hey everyone,

We're really sorry about the technical issues with self mystery gifting on Friday. There was a problem with the store which was causing the unable to process error some of you were seeing.

We'll be extending Self Mystery Gifting by another day to make up for it. So Self Mystery Gifting will be enabled until 11:59pm AEDT Tuesday.

Sorry we dropped the ball on this one!

replies.body: i decided to use this, i did it four time i think maybe three...it was until it said daily limit reached, i got ionia master Yi, SK t1 zyra , Forecast Janna, which i was really happy about, and then some stuff for champs i did not know i had. all in all, a good run
I got Demonblade Tryndamere, Sanguine Garen, Lord Mordekaiser, TPA Shen and Deep Terror Thresh

Spirit guard udyr omg thank you!
Pulsefire ezreal!!!
Aether Wing kayle!

Thanks riot :)

How about a permanent self mystery gifting, but with less chances of rare/expensive skins?  

Riot Please!
:3

In order:
1-Demonblade Tryndamere
2-Little Knight Amumu
3-Guardian of the Sands Kha'Zix
4-Chrome Rammus
5-Arcade Miss Fortune

1, 3, and 5 were the skins I would have chosen for those chars, though I already had skins for 2 and 4. So taking into account the duds I still got 40% off which was definitely worth it :D I did use the IP boost to buy ~4 chars I liked most/all the skins for to decrease the odds of getting duds but none of them got a skin.
Got Lollipoopy, I don't care about the other skins, that made it all worth.
muahaha~ i got Shurima Desert Zilean + wicked Lb today it is awesome hell yes~
